title: Senior Software Engineer - Home Ecosystem (Frameworks)
summary: Are you passionate about shaping the future of home technology? At Apple’s Home Ecosystem group, we’re dedicated to creating groundbreaking experiences and cutting-edge technology that redefine the way we interact with our homes. As a Senior Software Engineer, you will play a pivotal role in developing innovative frameworks, daemons, and services for Apple platforms, driving forward our vision of intelligent, connected home experiences.
description:
As a Software Engineer you will design and develop core infrastructure for a variety of Apple devices. You will:
- Contribute to the creation of new frameworks and services, leveraging AI and ML to enhance decision-making and user experience.
- Engage in every phase of development—from concept to deployment—collaborating with diverse teams across Apple.
- Help design, develop, and patent the next generation of Apple’s state-of-the-art technologies, shaping the future of our ecosystem.
- Work across applications, user-level libraries, and communication protocols, focusing on building low-latency, high-performance software.
- Write clean, maintainable, and production code with appropriate documentation and tests
preferred_qualifications:
Experience with ROS
Experience integrating ML features
Experience developing software for Apple devices
Experience with home automation and home automation standards
BS/MS/PhD in Computer Science, related fields, or relevant professional experience.
pay_benefits:
At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $143,100 and $264,200, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location.

Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs. Apple employees are eligible for discretionary restricted stock unit awards, and can purchase Apple stock at a discount if voluntarily participating in Apple’s Employee Stock Purchase Plan. You’ll also receive benefits including: Comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, a range of discounted products and free services, and for formal education related to advancing your career at Apple, reimbursement for certain educational expenses — including tuition. Additionally, this role might be eligible for discretionary bonuses or commission payments as well as relocation. Learn more about Apple Benefits.

Note: Apple benefit, compensation and employee stock programs are subject to eligibility requirements and other terms of the applicable plan or program.
